documents.document: OK, convenient and friendly We Spent three nights here, the Hotel is 'L' shaped, the picture shown for the hotel is 90 degrees to the main road. The rooms were comfortable and in good condition, clean. The road noise is loud, we bought ear plugs after the first night and slept sound the following two.Very convenient for public transport and eating places, local shops quite good, the area was clean and tidy, we felt quite safe walking around.
